email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m reaching out because we’re putting together a Community Sports Program designed to engage local youth (ages 8-16) in a variety of athletic activities and life-skills workshops, and we’re eager to explore a partnership with the Active Youth Foundation.

Program snapshot:
• 8-week after-school sessions covering soccer, basketball, and track & field
• Focus on teamwork, discipline, and healthy lifestyles
• Run at neighborhood parks and school gyms beginning in September

What we can bring:
• Trained volunteer coaches and program managers
• Equipment grants and insurance coverage
• Day-to-day logistics and communications

Where AYF could add tremendous value:
• Youth outreach and recruitment through your existing network
• Mentorship components and leadership workshops
• Additional coaching support and community visibility

If this sounds aligned with AYF’s mission, could we schedule a brief (20–30 minute) call next week to discuss details? I’m currently available Tuesday–Thursday between 10 am–2 pm, but I’m happy to adjust to a time that suits you better.

I’ve attached a concise proposal for quick reference and can provide the full Notion doc upon request.

Thanks so much for considering this collaboration—I’m excited about the positive impact we could make together.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Title / Organization]
[Phone]
